execution_tracking.verification_command: npm run typecheck; node --import tsx --test tests/unit/analytics-service.test.ts
execution_tracking.verification_notes: Added an in-memory TTL cache utility (`lib/cache.ts`) and clinic-scoped analytics aggregate service with cache-aware dashboard metrics, trend buckets, and service breakdowns sourced from the existing invoice/appointment/patient stores. The analytics unit test verifies tenant isolation, aggregation math, and cache-hit behavior on the second call.

evidence.item: When work starts/completes, record changed files, test commands, screenshots (UI tasks), and commit/PR references here.
Cache behavior verification: analytics service returns `cache.hit=false` on first request and `cache.hit=true` on second identical request within TTL.
Tenant isolation verification: clinic_2 appointments/invoices seeded in the test do not affect clinic_1 analytics totals or service breakdown.
Aggregation verification: test asserts billed/collected/outstanding cents, paid/overdue invoice counts, completed/no-show appointment counts, and trend/service breakdown generation.
Typecheck/tests passed: `npm run typecheck`; `node --import tsx --test tests/unit/analytics-service.test.ts`.
Feature commit: 8eb1159 (feat(healio-analytics): analytics service and cache).
